description.value: At 12th level or higher, a monk can slip magically between spaces, as if using the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{Dimension Door}. Using this ability is a move action that consumes 2 points from his ki pool. His caster level for this effect is equal to his monk level. He cannot take other creatures with him when he uses this ability.
